R

ReportGenerator - Class in controller
This class is used to make a report, a report is a file with a list of tasks.
The report is a text file with a ".dat" extension.
ReportGenerator(LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Constructor for class controller.ReportGenerator
 
reportPanel() - Method in class view.View
This is the report panel which is the panel that contains the tasks filter and the button used to generate the report.
resetClock() - Method in class view.View
This method resets the timer.
resourceBundle - Variable in class controller.Controller
 
resourceBundle - Variable in class view.View
This is the resource bundle for the languages.
rootPanel() - Method in class view.View
This is the root panel, it contains every graphical object.
run() - Method in class controller.ClockManager
Here in this method, the clock is updated with the current time and date that are taken from the now method.
The method getFancyDateTime is used to convert the original toString() method output in a more fancy string.
run() - Method in class controller.persistence.PersistenceManager
This method is needed to save the tasks in the database and in the file.
run() - Method in class controller.TimerManager
This method runs the methods to update the string of the clock and then the label of the clock.
